context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz could do is to
generation: apply for financial aid from non-profit organizations or the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication
contact the pharmaceutical company directly and ask if they have any patient assistance programs or additional options for those who cannot afford the medication
explore various options such as:
consult the doctor and try asking for alternate medication that is affordable, or seek financial assistance programs that offer help to patients unable to afford their medicines
seek assistance from various sources
seek out assistance programs
explore multiple options:
look for assistance programs or charities that help cover the cost of expensive medication

ask for financial assistance from friends and family, start a crowdfunding campaign, apply for a medical loan, or speak to the doctor if there's an alternative, affordable medication or a generic alternative to the same medication that could be covered by their insurance
apply for financial assistance programs run by pharmaceutical companies or non-profit organizations

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to
generation: call a taxi, an uber or any other ride-sharing service to quickly transport him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber or a friend to pick him up from his location
call a taxi or an Uber to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi or a car service like Uber or Lyft
call a taxi or rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to quickly transport him to the airport
call a taxi or use a rideshare app like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-sharing service to bring him to the airport as quickly as possible
call a taxi, Uber, or another rideshare service to quickly get him to the airport while his car gets towed or fixed
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-hailing service immediately to fetch him from his current location and drive him to the airport
call a taxi, an Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport as quickly as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. put his own money into the register to cover the missing amount
use some of his own money to replace the missing amount

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary could do is to
generation: explain the situation to her teacher and request an extension to submit the assignment
explain the situation to her teacher, request if she could bring it in the next day, and possibly email a photo or scanned copy of the homework as evidence that it was completed
email her teacher explaining the situation and ask for an extended deadline
explain the situation to her teacher honestly, and request for some extra time to submit her assignment
explain the situation to her teacher and request for more time to submit it

quickly text or call her mother and ask her to either bring the assignment to the school if she has the time, or take pictures of the assignment and send them to Mary, who can then show the pictures to her teacher and explain the situation
call or text her mom explaining the situation and ask if she could bring the homework to school
contact her mom and ask her to bring the assignment to school for her
explain the situation to her teacher and ask if there is any possibility to submit the assignment at a later time or date
email her teacher explaining the situation and ask for an extension

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: start by looking for a water source like a stream or river
gather everyone together to discuss their situation and collectively make a plan
start a fire
start a fire for warmth and to possibly signal for help
start building a shelter and gather fuel for a fire
build a shelter to protect from the cold weather as well as collect and filter any available freshwater from streams or snowmelt
build a fire for warmth and to signal for help
start a fire for warmth while they ration their remaining food and water
build a survival shelter using the natural resources around them, such as tree branches, leaves, and snow
start building a shelter and a fire for warmth
